member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Sql.ConfigurationResources.ConnectionString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Connection string for the SQL Server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Sql.ConfigurationResources.Source_NestingSeparator
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. Special character in the column name to indicate that nested document is needed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Sql.ConfigurationResources.Source_Query
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SQL query to get the data. Query and QueryFile are mutually exclusive to each other, only one of them can be specified.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Sql.ConfigurationResources.Source_QueryFile
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Path to the file containing SQL query. Query and QueryFile are mutually exclusive, only one of them can be specified.
